segments.text: Next to the boy, the girl is standing on the floor, watching him intently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her posture is so attentive, she's clearly part of this whole scheme.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has one arm raised, her palm open, anticipating her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She must be so excited for a cookie from that jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her eyes are fixed on the cookies, full of expectation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sweet how they're cooperating in their little secret mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's not even touching the stool, but she's definitely involved.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I remember sneaking treats as a child; it brings back memories.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks like she's practically vibrating with anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they planned this whole cookie heist together.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The tension in her stance is almost palpable as she waits.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She clearly trusts the boy to deliver their delicious loot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene feels so conspiratorial and fun.
segments.speaker: PAR
